entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flyout on Windows doesn't display programmatically created entries. #12149
  • Toolbar Secondary Items Displaying like Primary Items in IOS #12140
  • IOS: Border Visual States Problem #12137
    Backlog
  • Hamburguer icon (Flyout Menu) does not actualice colors depending the theme of OS (Dark/Light) - Windows #12136
  • IOS: Scrollview inside Refrehview #12132
  • Refreshview - Collectionview sizing not working correctly #12131
  • CollectionView slow/jittering scroll #12130
  • ios16.1.1 pasting on entry causing crashing of app? Make unable to publish app on App store #12129
  • Cannot publish to Windows store, Publish menu is grayed out. #12127
  • The MAUI Blazor doesn't work on iOS 16.2. #12124
  • Azure DevOps builds failing with latest version of MAUI #12122

Closed

  • Unable to install Microsoft.Maui.Sdk.Msi.x64 during workload install dotnet 7.0.100 sdk #12030
  • dotnet-bot image doesn't load on Windows unpackaged app #6202
    Backlog
  • Custom Control Property does not Bind #8501
  • Can not start the Android Emulator with Visual Studio 17.4.3 #12110
  • Error rendering entry within a grid #11878
  • Label binding not works in collectionview in release mode #11726
  • Xamarin.AndroidX.Work.Runtime support for .net7 #11887

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/test 30000 #12152
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #12148
  • [net7.0] Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #12147
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #12146
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #12145
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] Make OnShouldReceiveMapTouch static #12142
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #12141
  • [net7.0] [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #12139
  • [net7.0] Notify StrokeDashPattern changes with StrokeDashArray changes #12138
  • Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12135
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12128
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Flashlight API Docs #12144
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials MainThread API Docs #12143
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221116.1 to 1.2.221209.1 #12133
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update Essentials Gyroscope API Docs #11925
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use the UpdateHasContainer method everywhere #12119
  • [net6.0]Fix Managing Layout Children #12125
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, platform/tizen

Updated

  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779
    area/layout 🔲
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [net7.0] Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11791
    area/layout 🔲
  • Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12114
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907
  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Rename W2DImage to PlatformImage #12104
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Allow transparent modal pages #11795
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Update Essentials Map API Docs #11936
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling (Shadows) #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 Planning
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
